trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the bounding rectangle necessary to accept new text changes.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento é gerado quando o retângulo delimitador necessário para aceitar o novo texto é alterado.

trans-unit.source: If the text within the control spans multiple lines, the requested rectangle will always be the width of the control.
trans-unit.target: Se o texto dentro do controle se estenda por várias linhas, o retângulo solicitado sempre será a largura do controle.

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event in your control to implement auto-resizing for multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: Você pode manipular esse evento em seu controle para implementar o redimensionamento automático para várias linhas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>controles.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: The ContentsResizedEventArgs identifies the requested size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: O ContentsResizedEventArgs identifica o tamanho solicitado de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContentsResizedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContentsResizedEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the requested dimensions of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que especifica as dimensões solicitadas do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Represents the requested size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa o tamanho solicitado do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: When text is entered into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control determines the proper size of the control in order to display all of the contents of the control.
trans-unit.target: Quando o texto é inserido no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>controle, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>controle determina o tamanho adequado do controle para exibir todo o conteúdo do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: You can use the NewRectangle property in an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.ContentsResized> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control to properly size the control to display all of the control's contents.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar a propriedade NewRectangle em um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.ContentsResized>evento o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>controle para dimensionar corretamente o controle para exibir todo o conteúdo do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.ContentsResized>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the requested size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa o tamanho solicitado do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"> </xref> controle.
